entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 p.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 p.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 7:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: ESE 44 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Fog patches overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
